testcase.name: Unimplemented step signals pending status
testcase.system-out: Given a step that isnt implemented yet......................................pending

testcase.name: Steps before unimplemented steps are executed
testcase.system-out: Given an implemented step...................................................passed When a step that isnt implemented yet.......................................pending

testcase.name: Steps after unimplemented steps are skipped
testcase.system-out: Given a step that isnt implemented yet......................................pending Then a step that we expect to be skipped....................................skipped
